title: Are taxi drivers in Wilmington required to turn on their fare meters? Several times I\'ve noticed a meter not turned on too far into the ride and in turn have had widely inconsistent fares for the same short drive. It\'s aggravating to feel taken advantage of because I\'m a single woman who would not necessarily argue with the overpriced fares.
